Date: Sunday, 8/3/1991
Subject: Status of Tom Urbani
Dear Sir,
Tom Urbani seems overmatched at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an ERA of 5.37 over there, so I think
you should demote him.

Regards,
Scouting Director
